weekly_top5.name: L3Harris Technologies, Inc.

target.bear_case_note: Setup weakens if price loses short-term trend support (falls back below key moving averages) and contract/newsflow momentum fades.

primary_catalyst.title: Major contract award newsflow (missile tracking satellites) + follow-through coverage
primary_catalyst.why_it_matters: A large, specific contract win can drive near-term estimate revisions and momentum follow-through, especially if additional details/related awards emerge in the next week.

sources.title: L3Harris Technologies, Inc. (LHX) Wins $843M Contract For Missile Tracking Satellites
L3Harris Wins $843M Deal to Produce 18 Infrared Satellites for SDA

risk_factors: Defense names can be headline-sensitive (geopolitics/sanctions); reversals can be sharp if risk-off hits the sector.
Low realized vol (per packet) may reduce probability of a full +10% move without incremental newsflow.

weekly_top5.name: Hut 8 Corp.

target.bear_case_note: Setup invalidates if BTC/crypto complex sells off sharply or if the stock breaks below short-term moving averages on rising volume.

primary_catalyst.title: Analyst target raise/upgrade-driven momentum (colocation execution) + crypto-linked beta
primary_catalyst.why_it_matters: Crypto-proxy equities can move >10% quickly when analyst actions coincide with BTC volatility; recent PT bumps can extend momentum if BTC stabilizes or rebounds.

sources.title: Keefe, Bruyette & Woods Bumps Hut 8 (HUT) Target on Strong Colocation Execution
Hut 8 (HUT) Jumps 14% on Bullish Rating, PT

risk_factors: High sector correlation to Bitcoin; a BTC drawdown can overwhelm company-specific positives.
High realized volatility increases both upside potential and gap-down risk.

weekly_top5.name: Lam Research Corporation

target.bear_case_note: Setup weakens if semicap sector rolls over (macro risk-off) or if the stock fails to hold above short-term moving averages after the China equipment headline.

primary_catalyst.title: China domestic equipment requirement headline (semicap newsflow) + analyst spotlight
primary_catalyst.why_it_matters: Policy headlines around China capex/equipment mix can re-rate semicap names quickly; incremental commentary/clarifications can drive a sharp 1-week move.

sources.title: Market Chatter: China Requiring Chipmakers to Use at Least 50% Domestically Made Equipment for Expanding Capacity
B. Riley Names Lam Research (LRCX) a Top Memory Recovery Play Due to Specialized Etch Leadership

risk_factors: Policy headline risk: if interpreted as negative for US tool vendors, the move could be down rather than up.
Semicap beta to rates/AI risk sentiment; broad tech pullback can cap upside.

weekly_top5.name: Victoria's Secret & Co.

target.bear_case_note: Setup weakens if the stock fails to break/hold near highs and retail sentiment turns risk-off; also vulnerable to negative inventory/margin headlines.

primary_catalyst.title: Analyst upgrade (momentum-driven) and retail sector positioning into year-end
primary_catalyst.why_it_matters: Upgrades can trigger incremental buying and short-term momentum continuation, particularly when the stock is near 52-week highs.

sources.title: Telsey upgrades Victoria’s Secret to Outperform on improved momentum
Wells Fargo turns more constructive on U.S. retailers for 2026, upgrades 2 stocks

risk_factors: Retail is headline-sensitive (promotions/inventory); adverse channel checks can reverse momentum quickly.
Volume ratio below 1 suggests breakout may need fresh demand to sustain a +10% move.
